overview: This is a movie about a bad boy from the wrong side of the tracks. He gets caught up in a bar brawl that ends up with him fucking a pretty little blonde. He is the type of guy who doesn't have money and doesn't like those who do. So when he gets roped into an affair with a sexy heiress, he surprises himself. Along with this serious story is, of course, steamy sex scenes that will make you wish you were the bad boy! Enjoy!
title: Heiress
